thread.title: Katie Rough murder case: Girl, 15, appears in court
thread.title_full: Katie Rough murder case: Girl, 15, appears in court

title: Katie Rough murder case: Girl, 15, appears in court
text:
Close share panel A 15-year-old girl has appeared in court charged with the murder of seven-year-old Katie Rough. 
The teenager was arrested after Katie was found seriously injured on a playing field in York on Monday. She later died in hospital. 
The girl was remanded in custody by York magistrates and is due to appear at Leeds Crown Court on 13 January. 
She has also been charged with possession of an offensive weapon. Related Topics
